pr_title: [CDAP-16076] fix runtime args not being passed to pipeline start

timeline.message: fix runtime args not being passed to pipeline start

timeline.bodyText: Should the comment be updated? (Same for the corresponding comment below)
timeline.author: yukiej

replies.bodyText: The comment still stands true. Previously, instead of ignoring the empty values, we were only adding empty values, that was the bug.
replies.author: itsanudeep
